languages.text: "Они, как и я, — просто актеры. Спектакль не окончен, а значит их место на сцене рядом со мной".

traits.locale_text: "Они — мой инструмент. Ими я вершу возмездие и караю своих врагов".

languages.text: "They are like me — simply actors. The show is not yet ended, which means their place is on stage with me."
languages.original_text: "Они, как и я, — просто актеры. Спектакль не окончен, а значит их место на сцене рядом со мной".

traits.locale_text: "They are like me — simply actors. The show is not yet ended, which means their place is on stage with me."
"They are like me — simply actors. The show is not yet ended, which means their place is on stage with me."
"They are like me — simply actors. The show is not yet ended, which means their place is on stage with me."
"They are like me — simply actors. The show is not yet ended, which means their place is on stage with me."

languages.text: “他们和我一样，都是演员。这场表演还没有结束，也就是说，他们应该和我一样，一起站在舞台上。”
languages.original_text: "They are like me — simply actors. The show is not yet ended, which means their place is on stage with me."

traits.locale_text: “他们和我一样，都是演员。这场表演还没有结束，也就是说，他们应该和我一样，一起站在舞台上。”

languages.text: «Son como yo: meros actores. El espectáculo aún no ha acabado, lo que significa que su lugar está sobre el escenario, a mi lado».
languages.original_text: "They are like me — simply actors. The show is not yet ended, which means their place is on stage with me."

traits.locale_text: «Son como yo: meros actores. El espectáculo aún no ha acabado, lo que significa que su lugar está sobre el escenario, a mi lado».

languages.text: 「彼らは私と同じくただの役者だ。ショーは終わっていない…つまり、彼らは私と共に舞台の上にいるべきだ」
languages.original_text: "They are like me — simply actors. The show is not yet ended, which means their place is on stage with me."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは私と同じくただの役者だ。ショーは終わっていない…つまり、彼らは私と共に舞台の上にいるべきだ」

languages.text: "Sie sind wie ich — einfache Schauspieler. Die Vorführung ist noch nicht beendet, darum ist ihr Platz auf der Bühne, bei mir."
languages.original_text: "They are like me — simply actors. The show is not yet ended, which means their place is on stage with me."

traits.locale_text: "Sie sind wie ich — einfache Schauspieler. Die Vorführung ist noch nicht beendet, darum ist ihr Platz auf der Bühne, bei mir."

languages.text: « Ils sont comme moi, de simples acteurs. Le spectacle n'est pas encore terminé, ce qui veut dire que leur place est sur scène, à mes côtés. »
languages.original_text: "They are like me — simply actors. The show is not yet ended, which means their place is on stage with me."

traits.locale_text: « Ils sont comme moi, de simples acteurs. Le spectacle n'est pas encore terminé, ce qui veut dire que leur place est sur scène, à mes côtés. »

languages.text: "Onlar da benim gibi... Hepsi birer aktör. Gösteri henüz sona ermedi, o yüzden sahnede yanı başımda olmaları gerekir."
languages.original_text: "They are like me — simply actors. The show is not yet ended, which means their place is on stage with me."

traits.locale_text: "Onlar da benim gibi... Hepsi birer aktör. Gösteri henüz sona ermedi, o yüzden sahnede yanı başımda olmaları gerekir."
